ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 1/3" Sony Super HAD CCD, Color DSP, Horizontal resolution 480 TV Lines.
24 pcs IR Infrared LED illuminators for night vision, 65 ft IR range.
3.6mm fixed lens with wide view angle, 0 Lux /F1.2 (IR LED on).
Vandal-proof design, Multi-Axis for wall or ceiling mounting, weatherproof.
All in one IR dome security camera with cable. Power supply not included.
